originalText.text: Peter has worked with my family for several months now and he has an extraordinary talent for untangling complicated family dynamics. He has been able to help our daughter navigate the anxieties of adolescence, made more acute thanks to COVID, while simultaneously putting our minds at ease. His plan for growth and healing has given us all a feeling of being back in control and working together toward a shared goal. He is incredibly warm, thoughtful and empathetic while also mentally sharp and insightful.

originalText.text:
I met Dr. Rockland when I was 19 years old and nine years later l still see him on a regular basis.  I have lived in all parts of the United States and Dr. Rockland has always been a constant in my life.   I consider him to be one of the most important people in my life and I'm not sure where I would be today without him.  He is caring, patient, attentive, and willing drop anything at a moments notice to tend to needs.

Choosing a psychiatrist is a very personal process.  Before Dr. Rockland I saw a number of psychiatrists, none of whom I had a connection with.  When I met Dr. Rockland I was struck by his demeanor and professionalism.  We got to work on the problems I faced and he was instrumental in my recovery and subsequent maintenance.

I can't speak highly enough about Dr. Rockland.  I consider him a friend and someone I would recommend to anyone.

originalText.text: I had a terrible experience with Dr. Rockland.  He was not thoughtful and a huge waste of my money.  I was extremely underwhelmed with his abilities.  Even he knew that he was not trained properly, he continued to take money because he could.  Shame on you.
